    <span>Forecasting Mortality Due to Extreme Temperatures<strong> · </strong> <em>Group Capstone Project</em></span>
    <p>Interactive R Shiny dashboard to estimate mortality due to extreme temperatures across BC. Collaboration with the Office of the Provincial Health Officer as part of the Master of Data Science capstone project.</p>
    <span><a href='https://seshafi-bc-health-dashboard.share.connect.posit.cloud/'>BC Mental Health Services Dashboard</a><strong> · </strong> <em>Individual Academic Project</em></span>

    <span><a href='https://github.com/UBC-MDS/Group24-pystats'>Python Stats Package</a><strong> · </strong> <em>Group Academic Project</em></span>
